questions.question: What is a key feature of Amazon CloudWatch Logs for machine learning (ML) infrastructure monitoring?
options: The capability to integrate CloudWatch Logs with your custom machine learning pipelines
The Patterns tab on the Logs Insights page to find recurring patterns in your query results
The option to store your log files in an Amazon S3 bucket for long-term retention
The ability to automatically scale your EC2 instances based on log anomalies
correct_answers: The Patterns tab on the Logs Insights page to find recurring patterns in your query results
questions.topic: 4.2 Monitor and Optimize Infrastructure and Costs
